sqlMap.update: update vortex_resource r1 set (acl_inherited_from) = (select r2.resource_id from vortex_resource r2 where r2.prev_resource_id = r1.acl_inherited_from) where (r1.uri = #uri# or r1.uri like #uriWildcard# escape '@') and r1.acl_inherited_from is not null and r1.acl_inherited_from != #inheritedFrom#
sqlMap.select: select c.id as ID, #resource.URI# as URI, c.time, c.author, c.title, c.content, c.approved from vortex_comment c inner join vortex_resource r on c.resource_id = r.resource_id where c.resource_id in (select resource_id from vortex_resource where uri = #resource.URI# or uri like #uriWildcard# escape '@') and rownum <= #max# order by c.time desc
